name: opencode-warcraft-notifications
description: Get nostalgic Warcraft II sound notifications in your terminal when AI completes tasks, making your coding sessions more fun and engaging with classic game audio cues.

installation.summary: Install via npm to enable Warcraft II sound effects for task completion notifications in OpenCode.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install -g opencode-warcraft-notifications
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugin": ["opencode-warcraft-notifications"]
}
```

Restart OpenCode to activate the sound notifications.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

Once installed, the plugin automatically plays Warcraft II sound effects when:

- Tasks are completed successfully
- Builds finish
- Tests pass or fail
- Long-running operations complete

The classic Warcraft sounds provide audio feedback without being intrusive, letting you know when the AI has finished working on your requests.

No configuration needed - just install and enjoy the nostalgia!
